data.title: Love atmosphere, Irish bartenders and pizza
data.text: The bartender/owner Brian is the sweetest guy :)  Gotta love that accent!  This place is spacious and has pool tables and darts.  They also have live music some nights.  Their pizza is very good!

data.title: Fun event
data.text: The Claddagh has all the makings for a great pub...great space, friendly bartenders, live music, and good food.  The space is huge and has many different choices for seating.  We were there for the Pet Rock fundraiser and had lots of fun.  Drinks and food are reasonably priced.

data.title: Only been here for races
data.text: I have only run a few races from here and had a few drinks. Never really spend significant time here. So the few races that I have done from here have been excellently run and then afterwards when I have gone inside for a few beers, service was quick even though they were slammed with a bunch of runners. Overall can't complain

data.title: Consistently Awesome
data.text: Always a good time. Staff are friendly,  fast and courteous.  Mixed drinks and food are reasonably priced.  Entertainment of local bands have been fun.

data.title: Fast bartenders
data.text: Saw Candlebox and 4 other bands here last night. Place was sold out and they had 6 or 7 bartenders who were all fast and attentive Never had to wait for a drink. Had to pay $10 to park here though. They've got an outdoor patio which was cool. Decent place to see a show, I would go again.

data.title: Awesome Irish pub
data.text: Trivia on Wednesday Good Irish food, huge bar with darts, pool tables and lg screen TV's fun for everyone great bands, country nights etc...

data.title: A great bar with good atmosphere and music.
data.text: Try the nachos if you are hungry, pretty good. It is a dive bar with great atmosphere and great music. The neighborhood is kind of sketchy but the people in the bar are great. Drink prices are normal for a bar and the beer is usually cold. A great place to go if you want that local bar experience.
